Perform maintenance operations on the database to optimize performance and reclaim space.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"description":"Request parameters for the perform_database_maintenance endpoint","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Perform database maintenance operations","required":["force_vacuum"],"properties":{"force_vacuum":{"type":"boolean","description":"Whether to force a full vacuum (may take longer)","example":false}},"title":"PerformDatabaseMaintenance"}}},"required":true}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Successful response from perform_database_maintenance","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Response with maintenance operation statistics","required":["vacuum_duration_ms","analyze_duration_ms","wal_checkpoint_duration_ms","total_duration_ms","pages_vacuumed","wal_pages_checkpointed"],"properties":{"analyze_duration_ms":{"type":"integer","format":"int64","description":"Time spent analyzing in milliseconds","minimum":0},"pages_vacuumed":{"type":"integer","format":"int64","description":"Number of pages reclaimed by vacuum"},"total_duration_ms":{"type":"integer","format":"int64","description":"Total maintenance duration in milliseconds","minimum":0},"vacuum_duration_ms":{"type":"integer","format":"int64","description":"Time spent vacuuming in milliseconds","minimum":0},"wal_checkpoint_duration_ms":{"type":"integer","format":"int64","description":"Time spent checkpointing WAL in milliseconds","minimum":0},"wal_pages_checkpointed":{"type":"integer","format":"int64","description":"Number of WAL pages checkpointed"}},"title":"PerformDatabaseMaintenanceResponse"}}}},"400":{"description":"Bad request - invalid parameters or malformed JSON"},"401":{"description":"Unauthorized - no wallet is currently logged in, or authentication is required"},"404":{"description":"Not found - requested resource doesn't exist (e.g., NFT, offer, transaction)"},"500":{"description":"Internal server error - unexpected failure in wallet operations"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
